version_description: Minor bug fixes

- New Notification Features
- New Swagbucks OfferWall
- Bug fixes and enhancements

Earn Swag Bucks for shopping at your favorite stores! Open the app to start earning now.

Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
UI enhancements and bug fixes.

You can now watch Swagbucks TV from from within the Swagbucks mobile app! Clicking Watch within the app will no longer open the separate SBTV app.

As you can tell, your comments are always welcome. If there are any more ways you think we can make your mobile Swagbucks experience better, please let us know through the Contact Us form.

In the 3.2.1 update we are very excited to enable members to see their "recent earning activity" from within the Account section. Now users can see their past 3 months of activity, be it SB earned, pending Shop transactions or Visited sites.

Bug fixes and UI improvements.
Bug fixes, UI enhancements.
Bug Fixes, UI enhancements

Thanks for using Swagbucks! Based on customer feedback, we have added back the ability to earn SB by watching videos inside the app.

Additional features
- Shop - Significant UI update with filters for finding your favorite stores.
- Discover - Significant UI update to easily find new offers, coupons & more.
- Bug fixes
bug fixes and performance enhancements
bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Potentially earn unlimited SB in Watch with newly enabled Bonus rounds
- Discover Bug fixed which didn't show Featured Offers unless refreshed
- Activity Ledger bug now showing SB earned
- UI enhancements
- Performance Enhancements
bug fixes and performance enhancements

NOTICE: This update will remove Watch and Discover sections.
+ User Experience Updates
+ User Interface Updates
+ Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Curated Video Content

We update Swagbucks to bring you new features and make the experience better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Swagbucks features.
- New Shop Now screen
- Additional Onboarding features for new users to help you get familiar with Swagbucks
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Maximize your SB earnings by completing your Daily To-Do list from the Home tab. You can earn up to 2 Bonuses every day for completing the items listed
- Added better controls and more support while you are completing Surveys
- Bug fixes and updates to make the App even better

- Maximize your SB earnings by completing your Daily To-Do list from the Home tab. You can earn up to 2 Bonuses every day for completing the items listed
- Added better controls and more support while you are completing Surveys
- Bug fixes and updates to make the App even better

We hope you like to shop!
- Access coupon codes and deals when you select a store in the Shop Tab
- We've also fixed some bugs and made your overall app experience more enjoyable

- Enjoy the newly redesigned Answer tab with easier to access surveys and receipt uploads so you can earn more SB faster
- We've updated the home tab with more information including your current streak and Member Recognition so you can level up faster
- New animations inform you when you've completed a To Do list item
- We've also fixed some bugs and made your overall app experience more enjoyable

Play Swago through the app
Bug fixes and app optimizations

We've been working hard to make SB Mobile even better by fixing a number of issues under the hood. Upgrade now to get a more stable, faster Swagbucks app
What's New:
* Onboarding experience for new users to help you set your account up and get you to closer to redeeming your first Gift Card
* One click Claim Monthly Bonus
* Bug fixes and optimizations

We've been working hard to make SB Mobile even better by fixing a number of issues under the hood. Upgrade now to get a more stable, faster Swagbucks app
What's New:
* Scan items when you're shopping to earn instantly
* Your favorite stores have moved and are easier than ever to access
* Bug fixes and optimizations
